PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Act 1 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A (0). Mule Scion for Onslaught and Links
B (1). Buy Stormblast Mine, Take Freezing Pulse Links: (B-G) (B) Freezing Pulse - Onslaught (B-G) Stormblast Mine (B)
C (4). Lesser Poison, Buy Swift Assembly and Frost Bomb, Take Orb of Storms and Frost Blink Links: (B-B-G) (B-G-G) (B-B) FROSTBOMB - ONSLAUGHT - FROSTBLINK (B-B-G) STORMBLAST MINE - SWIFT ASSEMBLY - LESSER POISON (B-G-G) ORB OF STORMS - ARCANE SURGE (B-B)
D (8). Take Added Lightning Links: 2(B-B-G) (B-B) Frostbomb - Onslaught - Frostblink (B-B-G) Stormblast Mine - Swift Assembly - ADDED LIGHTNING (B-B-G) Orb of Storms - Arcane Surge (B-B)
E (10). 1 Wand Craft If Possible, Buy Smoke Mine, Take Flame Dash Links: 2(B-B-G) (B-B) (G) Stormblast Mine - Swift Assembly - Added Lightning (B-B-G) Frostbomb - Onslaught - ORB OF STORMS (B-B-G) FLAME DASH - Arcane Surge (B-B) SMOKE MINE (G)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Act 2 (KILL ALL) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(After White Beast) Take Quicksilver
(After Fidelitas) Buy Skitterbots, Take Herald of Ash
(After Weaver) Take Elemental Focus, Go to Act 1 Buy Flame Wall, Combustion, LMP
(At Vall Oversoul) Do Double Fire Wand Craft Links: 2(B-B-G) (B-B) (G) Stormblast Mine - Swift Assembly - Elemental Focus (B-B-G) Orb of Storms - Onslaught - Added Lightning (B-B-G) Flame Dash - Arcane Surge (B-B) Smoke Mine (G)
--- Act 3 ---
(After Crematorium) Take Flammability
(At Diala) Take Dex Amulet
(After Piety) Buy Armageddon Brand, Take Cremation, Buy Desecrate, Controlled Destruction, Wave of Convicton (Act 2)
Armageddon Brand - Onslaught - Combustion - Added Lightning Or Faster Casting (B-B-B-G) Cremation - LMP - Elemental Focus - Controlled Destruction (B-B-G-G) Flame Dash - Arcane Surge (B-B) Smoke Mine (G) Wave of Conviction (B) Herald of Ash (B) Skitterbots (B) Desecrate (G) Flame Wall (B)
--- Act 4 ---
(After Malachai) Take Immolate, Buy Ignite Prolif (Armageddon Brand - Ignite Prolif - Immolate - Combustion)
